“Congress’ role is to assist states to strengthen their election security, not create a federal takeover of their election systems... A fundamental right of our nation is the ability to choose our leaders. The American people deserve to have that right protected.”

“Our nations' election infrastructure is aging and at risk. Election Security Assistance Act provides assistance to states in updating their aging election infrastructure, empowers state officials to secure elections, & provides additional resources for improving cybersecurity.”

🚨ALERT🚨 CHA Ranking Member @RodneyDavis introduces the Election Security Assistance Act,
an election security bill that will assist states in securing elections by providing the resources most important to state election administrators.
